summary.description: Set of programs dedicated to perform proteomics data computations and render the obtained results in user-friendly GUIs. It focuses on: result validation (using custom filters and target decoy analysis), merge/comparison of datasets and label-free quantification (spectral count and LC-MS analyses).
summary.name: Proline
